Package org.eclipse.mosaic.rti

Class MosaicComponentProvider

java.lang.Object
org.eclipse.mosaic.rti.MosaicComponentProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
ComponentProvider
public class MosaicComponentProvider extends Object implements ComponentProvider

Provides access to component implementation for the runtime infrastructure, such as the TimeManagement, FederationManagement, and InteractionManagement.

This default implementation creates instances of:
  • LocalFederationManagement
  • TypeBasedInteractionManagement
  • SequentialTimeManagement

  • Constructor Summary

      Description copied from interface: ComponentProvider

    • getMonitor

      @Nonnull public final Monitor getMonitor()
      Description copied from interface: ComponentProvider
      Provides access to the Monitor implementation of this federation. The Monitor can be use to monitor certain events, e.g. the begin of the simulation, time of interactions, and the like.
